line_1: Deep Groans are heard and doleful Screams.
line_2: The frighted Sun withdraws its Beams,

line_1: Deep Groans are heard and doleful Screams.
line_2: O say, what this Convulsion means:

line_1: When thy fair Daughters with unheeded screams,
line_2: Ill-fated MOLESWORTH! call'd the loitering streams? —

line_1: On quivering wing the famish'd Vulture screams,
line_2: Dips his dry beak, and sweeps the gushing streams;

line_1: Of martyrs' groans, and virgins' screams,
line_2: Hence with all her pleasing dreams
